cab.content: Printed for the Cabinet. \ October 1924.SECRET. vCP. 477(24).V 89Situation in Bengal.I circulate for the information of my colleagues, in continuation of CP. 472(24), copy of a telegram from the Government of India reporting that the Bengal Ordinance will be promulgated ohN^Saturday. I propose to leave the matter to the Viceroy's discretion. nOLIVIER.23rd October 1924.Telegram from Viceroy, Home Department, to Secretary of State, dated 22nd Occober 1924.No. 3506. Reference to correspondence ending with your telegram dated 6th October, No. 2827.* Bengal Ordinance will be promulgated Saturday, 25th October.* No. 4 in CP. 427(24).7758 100 10.24
